steps.plaintext: Enter the room on the lower level of the Knights of Favonius Library
steps.markdown: Enter the room on the lower level of the ◀Knights of Favonius Library▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Knights_of_Favonius_Library▷

steps.plaintext: Explore the mysterious room‍[Does this step ever appear in the game? When does the quest end?]
steps.markdown: Explore the ◀mysterious room▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Mysterious_Room▷‍[Does this step ever appear in the game? When does the quest end?]

substeps.plaintext: While in the room, the player's party is limited to the Traveler. They cannot use their Talents, and the Party screen cannot be accessed.
substeps.markdown: While in the room, the player's party is limited to the ◀Traveler▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Traveler▷. They cannot use their ◀Talents▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Talent▷, and the ◀Party▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Party▷ screen cannot be accessed.
